alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Hopkins; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:17AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Calloway, Muhlenberg, Christian, southeastern Caldwell, Trigg, southeastern Hopkins and Todd Counties through 500 AM CST... At 416 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mortons Gap to near Canton to 6 miles southeast of Murray. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mortons Gap and Graham around 420 AM CST. Cobb around 425 AM CST. Central City and Powderly around 430 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Crofton, Hopkinsville, Weir and Dunmor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for western, south central and northwestern Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Hopkins; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
